snippet: The president is urged to put on hold cases under consideration by immigration authorities of U.S. citizens who are seeking permanent resident visas, or green cards, for immigrants of the same sex they legally married.
abstract: The president is urged to put on hold cases under consideration by immigration authorities of U.S. citizens who are seeking permanent resident visas, or green cards, for immigrants of the same sex they legally married.

headline.main: Gay and Immigrant Rights Groups Join Forces on Marriage Issue

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
